titleStmt.title: An excellent new ballad of the birth and passion, of our saviour Christ. To the tune of, Dulcina.

publicationStmt.publisher: for F. Coles, M. Wright, T. Vere, and W. Gilbertson,

notesStmt.note: In two parts, printed side by side.
Imperfect: torn; most of second part, including imprint, wanting.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
